Nit, but accessibility with links like "available here" isn't great (it's not immediately obvious what kind of link it is).

With raw links to pull requests, GitHub shows its identifier (in this case `#4861`) as the link text.


```suggestion
More information is available in <https://github.com/ggml-org/llama.cpp/pull/4861>.
```

(note that the angled brackets in this suggestion are purely there to allow a trailing dot outside of the URL)
